typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ServicePointID as string,
		SPChannel as string,
		MeterBadge as string,
		RecordID as string,
		SPCUOM as string,
		SPCPowerflowdirection as string,
		SPCIntervalLength as string,
		SPCTimeZone as string,
		{Reading Date} as string,
		{Reading Hour} as string,
		ReadingValue as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(EXT_LOADDATETIME = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	folderPath: 'meter_reading',
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
